WordPress & Webflow Development

We develop wonderful WordPress websites.

For over a decade, we've been partnering with clients to provide reliable and efficient web development services to help their businesses grow long-term.

Get website help
Join 50+ happy clients

Building a website for your business can be brutal.

First your try to DIY your site, only to be left with a bunch of broken links and a website that looks like it was built in 1999.

Next, you meet with a dozen development teams and get 3 proposals a month later.

If you're really lucky and you hire the right team, your website gets a whole lot better... then you request a small change and your team is unresponsive.

We've seen it happen to our clients, so we started Loopdash to become the web development team we wish we could have hired. That means providing fair pricing, fast turnaround times, and founder-friendly collaboration to build the website you envision.

FAQs

Who are you?

Loopdash is a design/development practice led by Gary Bunofsky, who oversees creative, dev, and strategy. Loopdash is composed of a selective group of collaborators that contribute to deliver an exceptional project outcomes.

What kind of projects do you work on?

We often find the most value working on large scale web or branding revamps that translate into marketing website projects. We like to collaborate closely with founders or marketing/product leads. Most of our clients hire us for:

  • Brand / Visual Identity
  • Website Design
  • Website Development in WordPress or Webflow
  • Web App Development in Rails or React
  • On-retainer Support (long-term projects where we act as an outsourced dev team)
What does it cost to work with Loopdash?

We like to work on a fixed-cost for a majority of our projects. To give an accurate figure, we need to understand your requirements, scope, deliverables and timelines. With that being said, most projects range from $10-20k USD and take around 4-12 weeks to deliver. The minimum level of engagement is currently set at $5K USD.

How do I join Loopdash?

We are not actively seeking new collaborators at this time. If you are interested in joining Loopdash, please send us a note at hello@loopdash.com
